Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin
Key Strengths: Direct link to reporting a missed bin
Recommendations.Reasoning: The provided link directly leads to a page specifically dedicated to reporting a missed bin, making it the most relevant option for council customer's information needs.

Recommendations.Title: Report Missed Bin
Key Strengths: Provides forms to report missed bins
Recommendations.Reasoning: While the link does require additional navigation, it offers more than just reporting a missed bin, which may be useful for further inquiries.

Recommendations.Title: Request a replacement bin/caddy
Key Strengths: Direct link for requesting replacement bins or caddies
Includes information about other bin issues
Recommendations.Reasoning: The link provides a specific page where residents can request replacements for their missing or damaged bins, making it relevant to customers needing that service.

Recommendations.Title: Report bins and litter
Key Strengths: Covers both missed bins and litter in the area
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though the link covers more than just missed bins, it also provides relevant information regarding litter and abandoned bins.

Recommendations.Title: Report a bin issue | Reporter details – Wigan Council
Key Strengths: Provides form to report various bin issues
Recommendations.Reasoning: The link offers form-based reporting for a range of bin issues, though it requires additional navigation to access the service.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: While all search results include information relevant to customers' needs, options 1 and 2 ranked highest due to their directness towards the specific customer need.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The analysis aimed to provide the most accessible and efficient options for reporting missed or damaged bins.
